title: Using Contrastive Learning with Generative Similarity to Learn Spaces that Capture Human Inductive Biases
details: R Marjieh, S Kumar, D Campbell, L Zhang, G Bencomo… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Humans rely on strong inductive biases to learn from few examples and abstract useful information from sensory data. Instilling such biases in machine learning models has been shown to improve their performance on various benchmarks …
